dialogues.text: Spider-Man, huh? Well, maybe I'll just go and wrestle myself one of these days... with all my new arms... I'm sure I can beat Crusher or any other monster. Suddenly OCK throws out his WALDOS from under his long white coat, grabs WEINER and, lifts him up in the air, smiles cynically and with cruelty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will I beat him, this Crusher, will I beat him or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... no, please... I mean yes, yes... you'll beat him easily... let me down... Please... I'll do anything for you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Parker data... get me the Parker data, you hear?!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CAMERA is mounted on a TRIPOD facing us. A TIMER winds down and it CLICKS. REVERSE ANGLE - CAMERA'S POV. SPIDER-MAN is clinging to the side of a WALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And one like this... (changing pose)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And one looking real sincere. The WHITE EYES narrow to a slit. CLICK. Suddenly he spots WEINER climbing onto his roof. He hides. WEINER tiptoes into the roof apartment. SPIDER-MAN jumps in and grabs him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm looking for Peter Parker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yes... so why not use the front door? SPIDER-MAN throws him back onto the roof so that he almos slides over the edge. WEINER turns, facing SPIDER-MAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I know you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw you crushing the Crusher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You like wrestling? SPIDER-MAN jumps and reaches WEINER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love it! You are the best wrestler I have ever seen... please don't hurt me! SPIDER-MAN picks up WEINER, throws him up to an antenna above the building, to which WEINER clings desperately. SPIDER-MAN circles the antenna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, please... don't kill me. Please help me down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I'll help you down. I am Spider-Man... the good guy, am I not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... yes, you are. SPIDER-MAN jumps to the CHIMNEY, picks WEINER up in his arms and whispers to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And by the way, Peter Parker does not live here anymore... SPIDER-MAN jumps with WEINER in his arms to the edge of the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And tell the Professor he can't have Peter's data. Goodbye. SPIDER-MAN drops WEINER off the roof, three floors straight down into heavy bushes below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SIGN tells us so. A CLERK is double checking a long list of items OCK has ordered.

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: Holy cow, whattaya building, fella, a cyclotron? (Ock glares at him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... lets see here. Page three. We got 30,000 feet of 50-gauge copper co-ax... twin 550 XK transformers... cadmium accelerator rails, a half dozen... a GBC relative multi-phase transducer... and one yellow thermos. (finishes computation)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrap it up...

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: What about the money... or do you pay by credit card?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a long beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cash! I'll be back soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ARMORED TRUCK rolls by and stops. TWO GUARDS open the Bank's DOORS. Suddenly a WALDO smashes through the DRIVER'S SIDE WINDOW of the ARMORED TRUCK, wrapping around the DRIVER'S NECK and pulling him through the WINDOW. The SHOTGUN goes for his weapon, but a WALDO smashes in and pulls the GUN out through his WINDOW. TWO WALDOS shoot out and attach themselves to the REAR DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on here? The WALDO knocks him over. OCK rips the DOOR off! The TRUCK is full of MONEY BAGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PHOTO ASSISTANT look on as JAMESON goes over PETER'S latest PHOTOS. They are his SPIDER-MAN shots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't he look amazing in that one? Look, he's flying in the air!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care if he flies to the moon. He's just another wrestler in a silly costume. Look at this, Parker, right off the wire. This is the guy who hit that armored truck this morning. They say he has metal arms... get me a picture of this character!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Metal arms?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The web faced weirdo... He is a joke in a Halloween costume... don't make me laugh. He tears up PETER'S SPIDEY PHOTOS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now get out of here and don't come back without something I can use!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir... (stops, and turns back)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mega baloney... A bug in blue tights... what next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Journal said he was a mega-smash on MTV...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WEINER is putting on a CLOWN SUIT. He fastidiously puts his ratty jacket on a hanger and hangs it on a PIPE. The PIPE turns into a snake. It is, in fact, a WALDO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning from work)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think you're doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to the Masquerade. It's Halloween tonight Doc, aren't you coming to the School Ball? Whoa, you could go without an outfit. A WALDO whips around WEINER'S throat... AARRRGH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not going to any ball, clown. You're going to get me Peter Parker's data...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was almost killed on my last try... Look at all these bruises...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care if you come back dead. Just get it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (croaking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cost you a thousand bucks, if I get it. The WALDO coils tighten around WEINER'S throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right... boss please let go... P L E A S E ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just get it, Weiner. I'm running out of time. If you fail me again, you won't have to concern yourself with money anymore... DO YOU GET ME CLOWN?! WEINER croaks his assent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is all dressed up for a party: LIGHTS, STREAMERS, GLITTER BALL, the WORKS! HARRY is dressed as a SPACEMAN; PETER wears his regular clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should have worn a costume. I told you to wear a costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's... embarrassing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's Liz... LIZ is crossing the dance floor dressed as an INDIAN PRINCESS in an MINI-DRESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... ROZ, dressed as a COWBOY, ambles over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... howdy partners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiya, Professor Rosomorf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any word on Doctor Octavius?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (falling in step)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing beyond what I read in the papers. I'm afraid he's not the same man we knew. You know, I've been digging through the notes on his experiments... PETER follows LIZ with his eyes. She takes a seat at a TABLE next to KIM who wears a HAREM GIRL outfit with the SALAMANDER around her neck. Next to KIM is... SPIDER-MAN! PETER'S eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You boys must have had an extraordinary classroom experience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyeing Spidey)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir... oh... I'm going to be a little late with my paper on the Planetary Conjunction, sir...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whenever you're ready... I'll look at it. I know it's going to be an important work... and Peter, take my hat. He hands PETER an oversized TEN GALLON HAT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a costume party. PETER and HARRY make their way through the dance floor to the table. PETER can't take his eyes off SPIDEY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, there's Spider-Man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the real one, I'm sure...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can never be sure... all kinds of crazy stuff can happen at a masquerade ball...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet I know who it is. As they take seats, PETER sees that SPIDER-MAN is trying to read the BUGLE'S sports section by party light. KIM waves. PETER nods and the BIG HAT falls over his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiya, Liz... LIZ moves to Flash, who's dressed in the SPIDER-MAN costume.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiya, Peter. Who is in the Spider-Man costume?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a very clever outfit you've got there, Flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a hike, asshole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Peter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you recognize him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His pretty blue eyes give him away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, who'll be sitting with you at the Halloween Ball?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers to Flash)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanna dance... Hey, Spider-Man... Shall we Flash dance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I'm reading the paper, okay? LIZ turns with a mild pout. Nervously, PETER ponders his chance. HARRY nudges him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take her now, it's easy... HARRY turns to KIM and does a clanking shimmy in the SPAC SUIT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna dance, Schechrezaa?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm pooped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not... She reaches for HARRY'S hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy jumping jelly beans, willya look at these pictures of Spider-Man? Wow! Is this guy great or what? LIZ looks. She shrugs. Then she shrieks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Peter! These are your pictures!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It says here "Photos by Peter Parker." PETER reacts, then looks over FLASH'S other shoulder. INSERT: There are three PHOTOS of SPIDER-MAN in the paper PETER BLUSHES, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (takes off his head mask)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know this guy, Parker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, yeah... sort of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow... I'll give you anything if you introduce us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Liz)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you grant me this dance...? LIZ joins him provocatively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Flash-Man... Wanna dance...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, why not. PETER is left alone, PETER leaves toward the entrance. At the REAR DOOR a BIG LIZARD passes a NOTE to a DALLAS COWGIRL who passes it to a KANGAROO. The KANGAROO hops across the dance floor to the STAGE where he hands the NOTE to a YOUNG WOMAN in a BASEBALL UNIFORM. She climbs the STAGE where she is bathed in a SPOTLIGHT. She gets a DRUM ROLL from the band. There are some BOOS as the bad stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, thank you. We have a special surprise guest tonight. (booo)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Empire State University Masquerade Ball presents... The "Slammy" winning star of MTV'S wrestling tournament... The Amazing Spider-Man! FLASH, amazed turns to LIZ. He points to himself and mouths, "Me?" (The REAL) SPIDEY drops from the ceiling an lands in a pose. The CROWD cheers. He does a flip to LIZ and extends a hand. The BAND starts up. LIZ demurs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers firmly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead... go ahead! LIZ takes SPIDEY'S hand and they move slowly and sexily onto the dance floor. They do a short simple number. SPIDEY returns LIZ to FLASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Flash)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... Flash... FLASH takes LIZ from PETER (SPIDER-MAN). LIZ and FLASH dance wildly. They finish to big cheers. The real SPIDER-MAN slides to center floor. The crowd backs away as SPIDEY spins out the greatest dance number in film history. He's all over the floor and on the walls and on the ceiling and on the GLITTER BALL. He takes LIZ and flies with her. He breaks the place up. Then drops in a pose. BIG CHEERS. LIZ stops breathless, very near to SPIDER-MAN'S face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers breathless)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One day you'll know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a long beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sound very familiar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure I do... I'm your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man! He jumps away and disappears, leaving the CROWD aghast an LIZ in love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN is flicking through the channels of his TV, aggravate as usual. It's all ROCK VIDEOS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to May)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a bunch of crap. Goddamn rock and roll's screwed up the whole TV. He flicks off the set and turns to MAY who's asleep on th couch. He gently nudges her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, May. Wake up and go to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It enters the EAST RIVER DRIVE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the city rolls by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fearful)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Can't you go any faster?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'm I in, a race?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fighting his fear)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know... I get this tingling in my brain, like some danger is lurking just ahead. I'm worried about Aunt May and Uncle Ben...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your family?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, they are kind of my parents. They raised me. I lost both of my parents in a car accident... please step on it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step on it... so now you want to kill yourself in another accident... not with me, Boychick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'm telling you... I've got this--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... tingling... I know. And I got ulcers... Everybody's got something to worry about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please... Faster... Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, you asked for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TAXI skids and swerves like crazy, bumping into everything in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GLASS SHATTERS. AUNT MAY sits up in bed with a start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? It's nothing... go back to sleep... (another crash)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'll go look. Go back to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WEINER is going through the drawers. He finds a nice BONE HANDLE KNIFE and pockets it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN descends the stairs from the bedroom. He peers off into the darkness and pulls his ROBE tight around him as if to ward off some unacknowledged danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TAXI driving fast through STREET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some crazy kinda town, huh? You hear about that hold-up? The guy with the six arms? Hey, I see it all on this job. (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kinda outfit is that, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panicked)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'm really in a hurry. BANG! A BLOW OUT. The CABBIE fights the wheel to the side of the road. Then he turns to SPIDEY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said the magic words, we have a flat Boychick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN comes in and looks around. A long beat. Then a noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A very scared WEINER hides, eyes widening. WEINER takes the BONE HANDLE KNIFE from his pocket. It glints in the MOONLIGHT. He moves off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN is looking for mice. He opens a closet. Nothing. He shifts around. Nothing. He moves off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CABBIE slowly changes the TIRE. Fearing the worst, SPIDEY gets out, looking for a ride. A TRUCK approaches. SPIDEY looks down at the CABBIE and then up at the TRUCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! You wanna hand me that lug wrench? He looks up to see SPIDEY go by, stuck to the side of the TRUCK like a spider.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some crazy kinda town...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY stares at the lettering on the side of the TRUCK. It says, "Victory Sporting Goods."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a thought)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sporting goods...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN comes in quietly. He looks around. He opens a closet. Nothing. He hears a CRASH. He wheels. A SHADOWY FIGURE runs by a doorway! BEN takes off like a shot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN runs through the rooms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN flies in and goes right to the RIFLE on the wall. WE hear WEINER clattering around the house in the background as BEN goes to a drawer and pulls out a BOX of BULLETS. He begins to fight the BULLETS into the RIFLE. WEINER comes flying in and tackles him. They fall to the floor, four hands on the RIFLE. They scuffle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I want it the kid's computer crap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go before I blow your brain's out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TRUCK pulls away leaving PETER in a POOL of STREET LAMP LIGHT. He's wearing a FOOTBALL JERSEY and SHORTS and carrying a SPORTS BAG. He begins to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MAY hears a CRASH. She pulls the covers up around her chin in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You let go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER runs up and hears a SHOT. He runs inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER runs in. He sees WEINER standing there with the RIFLE. They face off across the room. The moment hits PETER like a punch in the chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uncle Ben!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a wheeze)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter... PETER rushes to BEN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Uncle Ben... PETER tries to revive BEN, while WEINER runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PLASTIC FURNITURE, GARISH LIGHTING, CIGARETTES in the ASHTRAYS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a brave but fragile front)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben gets through everything. He'll be alright. The doctors are... AUNT MAY and PETER embrace, leaning on each other for support.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (compassionate)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me. You the nephew? PETER rises, nods. As AUNT MAY wipes away a sniffle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your uncle's a brave man. Apparently, the perpetrator was after something of yours. Your uncle didn't know what it was but he stood up to him anyway. You ought to be proud of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am... how is he... A grim-faced DOCTOR walks slowly across the room to them... MAY stands up slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ask the Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's my... how's my husband doing...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mrs. Parker, I'm sorry. We tried. MAY collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crash cart! STAT! The Detective pulls PETER gently away. The STAFF works on MAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let the medics handle it. (pause)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, if it makes you feel any better. We're gonna nail this guy. He crashed his getaway car. We got him trapped in a warehouse on Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Peter)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's alright. She just fainted. We'll have to check her for symptoms of shock. If you want to wait, you can get some coffee on the third floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I... I think I wanna go out for some fresh air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COP CARS, COPS, SEARCHLIGHTS playing their BEAMS against the ACME CHEMICAL STORAGE BUILDING. GUNFIRE flashes from one of the WINDOWS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELITE COPS in BASEBALL CAPS are plotting strategy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That place is loaded with solvents and chemicals. If we blast our way in, it's gonna go up like a roman candle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We could go in through the fifth floor wash room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that up there? Throw a light on that! COP #1 directs the BEAM of the SEARCHLIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN is climbing it, trapped in the GLARE of the SEARCHLIGHT. He freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got a partner!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every COP'S WEAPON is trained upward at SPIDER-MAN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got an accomplice up there! And we got a clear shot. Do we have a go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (filtered)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GUNSHOTS erupt around SPIDER-MAN and he skitters around t evade them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thinking they're shooting at him, WEINER shoots back. In the corner of his eye he sees SPIDER-MAN at a side WINDOW He aims his rifle and SPIDEY ducks out of the way. The frightened WEINER moves to the side WINDOW to blow SPIDEY away. As he moves past the front WINDOWS he is lit by the SEARCHLIGHTS that play on his face darkly. SPIDEY leaps in at FRONT WINDOW and drops neatly behind WEINER, landing a pose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (cold, hard)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say your prayers, Weiner! WEINER whips around and fires. SPIDEY leaps to avoid it and lands on a STACK of PAINT CANS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ain't takin' me... Spider-Man... who ever you are... SPIDEY gathers himself tighter. He leaps. A second GUN BURST comes in behind him, Several PAINT CANS erupt in cascades of COLOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hanging on ceiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, creep! WEINER aims and fires, several times. He is emptying his RIFLE. SPIDEY leaps away and lands on the top of a CASK marked "CAUTION-FLAMMABLE SOLVENT!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (taunting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try again. The CASK gives way and SPIDEY is plunged into the FLAMMABLE SOLVENT. WEINER smiles his stupid grin and takes aim. SPIDEY leaps out of the CASK and sticks to the roof BEAM. He's sopping wet. His hand slips down the BEAM as the SOLVENT works against his sticking power. He falls to the floor and scrambles behind some PAINT CANS. WEINER, crazed, fires wildly. One of the CANS EXPLODES. PAINT flows from it... burning! SPIDEY peeks out and sees a YELLOW RIVER OF FLAME creepin toward him. He sniffs his SOLVENT soaked outfit. He backs down a "corridor" of PAINT CANS. The YELLOW FIRE follows, now joined by a RIVER OF BLUE FIRE from another can. They're following the trail of SOLVENT he's dripping! He's trapped!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on bullhorn)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your last chance, you two. Either you're coming out, or we're coming in! SPIDEY'S against the WALL! PAINT CANS to his right and left, and a RIVER of RED FLAME joins the YELLOW and BLUE as they creep toward him! He climbs backwards up the wall, face toward the BLAZE. The COLORED FIRES join and follow him up the wall! They're licking at his feet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (at the window)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay back! (gun burst)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa... stay back down there! SPIDEY is inches from being torched. He sees a PIPE. He reaches out and grabs it. He swings out above the flames. But the PIPE begins to bend! The PIPE bends down... down... and then breaks! SPIDEY hangs precariously as WATER cascades out of the PIPE and puts out the FIRE. SPIDEY drops down and rest his head in his hands to collect himself. Then looks up. The GUN is at his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand up, you. SPIDEY stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have thirty seconds to come out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're my ticket outa here. Gimme that stupid mask! SPIDER-MAN hesitates. Then he begins to raise the MASK, but stops and shakes his head no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'll take it myself. He reaches for the mask and SPIDER-MAN flips him across the room. WEINER lands in a CARGO net and becomes ensnared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, look what we've caught in our web...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't hurt me, man. Please don't hurt me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COPS are poised at the door. A signal. They crash inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold your fire! WEINER is hanging from the ceiling in the the CARGO NET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me out of this madhouse! He falls down, immediately encircled by the POLICE OFFICERS. SPIDER-MAN flies above their heads, crashing through the WINDOW and disappears into the dark of night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A weird, flickering BLUE LIGHT dances around the hole in the CYCLOTRON. Then it cuts out. A HELMETED MAN pulls himself out of a HATCH. He flips up the HELMET. OCK is finishing putting together his new equipment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey. OCK goes about checking out the CYCLOTRON. It looks good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK starts flicking switches and reading DIALS, doing a "mission countdown" for his next experiment. This place has been "hot rodded" to the max.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reading dials and numbers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amperage, okay. Flux, 14. Negative variable differential... good enough. He shuts it down. The WHINE whirs down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey... now all I need is Parker's data. Where the hell is Weiner? Damn it... I can't trust anybody. (throws his Waldo in the air)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only you, my babies... only you can I trust... Okay... If I have to do everything myself... I'm going to do it. (to his equipment)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be back... my babies... my new babies! OCK hides the WALDOS under his coat and leaves the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is more EQUIPMENT than before. PETER is deep at work. His SPIDER-MAN UNIFORM hangs on the WALL. There is a knock at the DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Peter! Are you finished with my computer yet? I got a paper too, you know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panicked)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... oh, it's you, Liz... I didn't expect you... uh... give me a minute. He hides his SPIDER-MAN COSTUME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ waits impatiently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (opening the door)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi, Liz. Come on in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ enters, looking around. PETER covers for this and that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you doing in here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking around)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cleaning up. Come on. I'll get your computer. Where's Flash parked? He picks up the COMPUTER and turns to her, but she's already looking around the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flash didn't come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holding it)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Well... how are you going to get it home? LIZ walks into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taxi... I guess. She discovers the PRINTS of SPIDEY that PETER has taped u around the apartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must spend a lot of time with this Spider-Man guy... Peter! Don't you think you ought to unplug that! PETER looks and sees that he is tethered to the wall. Embarrassed, he puts the COMPUTER back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (embarrassed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I, uh, I'll go down to the corner... see it I can hail that taxi. PETER leaves. LIZ smiles. She likes PETER. Why is he so...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHADOW of a MAN can be seen hiding. PETER does not notice him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a KNOCK at the DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (crossing to it, wondering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter...? She is about to open the door when FOUR WALDOS smash through it, obliterating it. OCK stands in the shattered doorway, WALDOS writhing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doctor Octavius...! You're... You're... (finds the words)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so weird!... with those... what do you call those...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waldos... Did you hear about Spider-Man? (moving Waldos like spider's legs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's me... the real Spider-Man... now tell me, where is that jerky friend of yours... Parker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (protecting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter?... oh... he's not here. He's gone. I don't think he'll be back for awhile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (running his Waldo in her hair)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't lie to your Professor now, would you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not. Why would I lie about a thing like that? Really. He's... out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll wait. OCK grabs LIZ'S HAIR with his WALDOS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing... let me go! Please... take those things out of my hair!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Waldos, you mean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you call them... please... OCK shoots out TWO WALDOS. Simultaneously each grabs a CHAIR from different parts of the room and brings them to the TABLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit. She does. He does, too, and folds his WALDOS across his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (chatty)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a nice boy. A little nerdy maybe, but nice, wouldn't you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I don't know. Maybe. He's very inexperienced. ONE of OCK'S WALDOS rests on the TABLE curled around the COMPUTER. LIZ lets her hand rest on it. OCK warms immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you're a fascinating young lady...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so refreshing. You're so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shocking...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gone to far)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I wouldn't say shocking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would! She sticks his WALDO in the ELECTRIC WALL SOCKET behind the COMPUTER! The CURRENT sizzles through him and he leaps up, WALDOS akimbo, like the "cartoon cat." LIZ runs out the door. OCK extricates himself from the current and gives chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ burst from the DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter...! She looks both ways for PETER, doesn't see him, and takes off! OCK bursts from the doorway and runs off after LIZ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ running as fast as she can, but OCK is gaining quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TAXI drives up and disgorges PETER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks in. It's empty

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming from the street)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter! Help! Peter! PETER springs into action. He grabs his SPIDEY SUIT out of a drawer and starts taking off his clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ looks back and sees OCK CARTWHEELING toward her. She can't outrun him. She must hide. There's a CONSTRUCTION SITE on the right. She ducks down the alley next to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ runs into it and finds herself trapped on three sides by a high CYCLONE FENCE. Behind her, OCK'S WALDOS stretch out like waterbug legs. He bug-walks into the alley and laughs down at her from his perch atop the WALDOS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter Parker has something I want... And I'm going to have something he wants. She dashes past him and runs into the outboard CARGO ELEVATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks for the UP BUTTON and finds nothing! OCK, on his feet now, is on the wire mesh ELEVATOR CAGE in a flash. He tears the outer DOOR away. LIZ starts pressing KNOBS and LEVERS in panic. The LIGHT goes on. A WARNING BELL clangs. She finally finds the switch and the CAR leaps up just as OCK tears off its front door. LIZ, safe for the moment, watches OCK recede below, shaking the torn off door in a rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Extending WALDO over WALDO, OCK climbs the ELEVATOR HOUSING chasing the rising CAR inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAR arrives and LIZ jumps out. She's on nothing but a narrow GIRDER! She tightropes on the GIRDER. OCK gets to the top. He looks across at her. She's stuck between two unfastened GIRDERS, at a dead end. He slowly telescopes a WALDO toward her. She's got no place to run, no place to hide. He grabs her by the BLOUSE and lifts her off the GIRDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put her down, Ock. OCK looks across the street. There, on the top of a tall building, is SPIDER-MAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what's happening to you, Ock. I've been through a lot of changes myself lately. You have to listen to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holding Liz)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (seeing Spidey)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a lot of crap, clown... I am Spider-Man, not you. (points to Liz)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ask you girlfriend. (to Liz)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a good friend of Peter Parker's Ock. Just like that girl you're holding. Now let her go. OCK thinks for a moment, then he begins to extend the kicking and screaming LIZ out over the street, ten storie up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let her go? What an excellent idea. If you do not deliver your friend, Mr. Spider-Man, yes. Yes, of course, I'll let her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me down, you mechanical mutant! LIZ is having none of this. She kicks, she fights. She twists. She flails around, making things a little worse. The ground is yawning death beneath her. RRIIPP! PART of her BLOUSE tears away and LIZ plummets! SPIDER-MAN swoops down on a WEB-STRAND in his characteristic compound curve. He reaches out for the falling LIZ and misses her cleanly. The WEB is too short.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (falling away)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You jerk! He THWIPS her with a second WEB and together they swing t a HIGH GIRDER where he deposits her safe and sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (straightening herself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell your friend Peter next time I'll get the taxi myself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screams)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... you jerk... you phony Spider-Man... Prepare to meet your death, bug. SPIDEY THWIPS a beam and swings across toward OCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, I'm rather fond of living... especially now... (he looks at Liz)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lands on OCK'S GIRDER and the two progeny of the cyclotron face off for the first time, ten stories above the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a last appeal to reason)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Octavius. Just stop and think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am thinking, insect. I'm thinking about exterminating you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, if that's the way you want it... Let's see what those chrome knuckles can do, Doc... A WALDO lances out and catches SPIDEY flush on the jaw. It knocks him to another GIRDER. SPIDEY hangs on and rolls over. He rubs his jaw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great... SPIDEY gets ready to go into action and gets pummeled by another barrage of blows from above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I must kill you, you cretinous clown. OCK throws a roundhouse WALDO that nearly knocks SPIDEY off the GIRDER. He's just barely hanging on. But SPIDER-MAN'S not done yet. He THWIPS a HIGH BEAM and swings into a better attack position. The two SUPER- ADVERSARIES engage in battle. With OCK swinging from his WALDOS like a metal monkey and SPIDEY swinging from his WEBS like, well, like SPIDEY, they clang and bang through the GIRDERS of the CONSTRUCTION SITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once I dispose of you, Spider-Man, no one will be able to stop me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop you from what...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My destiny! OCK throws his biggest punch yet. SIRENS can now be heard in the street. SPIDEY avoids WALDO strike after WALDO strike. OCK eludes WEB after WEB. But SPIDEY'S agility soon has him turning circles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over here, Octopus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Professor Octopus to you Spider Jerk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give it up, Professor. You'll never catch me! OCK takes three steps and soars through the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK, misjudging the leap, soars right past SPIDEY and int an alley! Screaming all the way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK and TWO WALDOS pressed against each of the opposing walls. It's a tenuous grip. Then, very slowly, sparks flying from his WALDOS, OCK slides down into the alley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So long, sucker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COP CARS pull up. COPS leap from them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK makes it down, sees the COPS, ducks out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SEARCHLIGHTS go on. SPIDER-MAN swings back across the street to the CONSTRUCTION SITE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There he is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's that Spider-Man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY lands next to LIZ in a pose. Lit by the flashing BILLBOARD, he's weirder looking than ever. SPIDEY puts an arm around LIZ and extends a WEB SHOOTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think you're doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm rescuing you. With that SPIDEY leaps way out and he and LIZ swoop away on a WEB-STRAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks but nooooooooooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL WEAPONS point upward at SPIDEY'S movement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He won't get away this time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold your fire! He's got a girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like he's got a hostage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY sees the WEAPONS aimed upward. He shoots out another WEB and swings off in a different direction. LIZ whoops with the G-force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. Where are you taking me? SPIDEY hounded by the Police, rejected by the girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I better just take you back where you belong. He shoots out another WEB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on tight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Times Square)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open your eyes. They are standing on the ROOF of the CENTRAL TOWER of the EMPIRE UNIVERSITY BUILDING. LIZ opens her eyes. It's an extraordinary sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (the Empire State Building)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're trying to impress me Spidey, I want you to know I'm not easy. Okay, I'm impressed... now put me down, Spidey... put me down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like the way you say Spidey... Nobody calls me Spidey... now we go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They swoop down... and down... stopping on one of the building's SILLS, actually right in front of a WINDOW in the DORMITORY BUILDING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Tavern on the Green)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow... look, this is our dormitory. I can get to my room. Hey, wait a minute... there's Flash, if I'm not mistaken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know my name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz, listen to me. There's something I have to tell you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, put me down and we can talk, alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know who I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I know is you're the Amazing Spider-Man... or better you're Spidey the good guy on the block... you're a weirdo in a clown spider suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's all you know about me? (a beat, a sigh)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, lets get your boyfriend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many do you have? I meant Flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Flash is not exactly my boyfriend...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not? Then who is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's someone I like, but he's too shy to notice. (Flash appears)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz! (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Spider-Man)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know everybody... Flash we have to call Peter! FLASH rushes right past LIZ to the WINDOW. There's a NEWSPAPER in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, they won't let up, man! (shows Daily Bugle)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They keep calling you an accomplice in that burglary murder. But that's a crock, ain't it? I'm with you, Spidey, 100%

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the way, what are you doing with... Liz?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She needed a lift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... okay! This calls for a beer! A lot of beer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, but I have some business to take care of.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well... take care of that later. Wait here. I'll get the beer. He disappears. LIZ comes, tentatively, to the WINDOW where SPIDEY squats, desire and passion in his WHITE EYES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (accusatory)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you know this was Flash's place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter Parker told me all about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter told you all about Flash?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... he told me all about you. See you later. (he jumps away)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASH comes in with more BEER than a man ought to carry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, where'd he go? Hey, Spider-Man!! But SPIDER-MAN has disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (distracted)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter told your Hero all about me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He would, wouldn't he... that jerk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN lands on it. He drops in the SKYLIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops into the room and pulls off his MASK. The place has been ransacked. COMPUTER DISCS are all over the floor. PETER pulls a file marked "Planetary Conjunction." He opens it. A piece of PAPER falls out. It says, "Kiss it goodbye, Wall Crawler!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers angrily)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Octavius!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER is hurrying along. KIM in sunning herself wonderfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hurrying by)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim! Have you seen Harry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, lots of times. What a brainiac...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... have you seen him today?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, un unh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (catching up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (keeps walking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi... have you seen Harry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. What a night, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that was some ride home... must have been pretty exciting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was... okay. Look, I got two tickets to Les Miserables... wanna go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry... I'm really busy... I mean, not tonight... see you later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (thinking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Peter... how did you know about last night...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about last night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My exciting ride with Spider-Man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh... Sorry... I gotta hurry... I have to find Harry... I'll see you later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter! PETER runs off. He sees a car approach and flags it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Can I get a lift downtown?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take your shoes for a walk, Dork. FLASH gets out of his car, and crosses the lawn toward LIZ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK is hard at work. The room, still rippled, has been "hot rodded" to the max. Lots of jerry-rigged stuff has been added. OCK takes a sip from the THERMOS and flicks on the small TAPE RECORDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are new inserting Peter Parker's data on tonight's Planetary Conjunction. INSERT: The COMPUTER SCREEN displays Peter Parker's name and ID number and the title, "The Planetary Conjunction and it's effect on Earth Gravity."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes! Go on! Go on! INSERT: NUMBER SEQUENCES appear on the SCREEN. Then a GRAPHIC of the EARTH moving into line with SATURN, JUPITER, the SUN and the MOON. In the corner a NUMBER rises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enormous. It's enormous. (to recorder)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Parker calculations add 4% gravitational force at the moment of full Planetary Conjunction. (hits some keys)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adding this to present maximum power potential, I get... He looks up and sees the SCREEN a GRAPHIC "HOLE" opening up right through the EARTH! The widening HOLE is swallowing everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it. I knew it! Universal destruction! It's doable! I am putting a countdown clock on the Planetary Conjunction now! A LARGE DIGITAL DISPLAY reads, "13:00:03." The last seconds count down to, "12:59:59!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (playing the computer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey. Now let's see if I have enough power to drive this beast. He starts hitting KEYS on his COMPUTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER is working on LIZ'S COMPUTER. There is a KNOCK at his brand new, unpainted DOOR. He hurries to it and pulls the KNOB so quickly (forgetting his own strength) that th whole assembly comes off in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulling Harry aside)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta remember to have that fixed. (opens the door)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you are, I've been looking for you all over town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where were you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I went to the wrestling, wanted to see that Amazing Spider-Man, but he didn't show up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Harry something terrible happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My Planetary Conjunction papers... they were stolen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Are you sure...? Who would do such a thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ock...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course... but why...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to find out, sit down. (indicates computer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to access Dr. Octavius' main program. I want to know about his experiments with the cyclotron. Can you do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (starts hacking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can try. I could access the system in the dorm. Okay. And through that I could crack the main line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Now if we can just disrupt the Octavius file...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, let's try. HARRY cracks his knuckles like a safe cracker and bends t the task. The PHONE RINGS. PETER hits his jerry-rigged SPEAKER PHONE. HARRY keeps hacking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Parker? Peter Parker? This is J. Jonah Jameson!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking over Harry's shoulder)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Jameson, you got me at a bad time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need pictures of your friend, the Amazing Spider-Man. But I need bad guy shots, you got it? Lots of bad guy shots. We're gonna pin that insect to the wall. Whaddaya say? PETER hangs up. The DIAL TONE cuts off JAMESON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only he and the PHOTO ASSISTANT are there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about that kid? On the job already?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK is pacing around the hot rodded room. He checks this and that. He looks at the COUNTDOWN CLOCK (06:00:10) and throws himself down in his CHAIR. He resumes his check- down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fusion cells...? All up. Internal temperature... okay. Risk? (a long beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Acceptable. (another beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's fly. He starts flicking on SWITCHES and DIALS. The WHINE whirs up. He throws the RED POWER THROTTLE. The POWER DIAL goes to 90!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER and HARRY are at a COMPUTER. The LIGHTS flicker and dim. Then they go back on. PETER and HARRY look at each other and shrug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got something! INSERT: DIGITAL CLOCK display: "06:00:03"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me see. It's some kind of countdown clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Countdown to what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but whatever it is, it's only six hours away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Planetary Conjunction?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or Doc Ock's end of the world experiment... Or both!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. You're not telling me you think the world is gonna end tonight...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to wait around till midnight to find out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see what else we've got. Another set of numbers roll up on the SCREEN. They are accompanied by ELECTRICAL SYMBOLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It might be a calculation of the amount of power he needs to create the hole between the force and the anti-force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a lot of energy. What could generate power like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The closest you could come is the New York City Subway System. Again, the lights flicker and then dim and they return.

dialogues.speaker: HARRY/PETER
dialogues.text: (together)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta talk to Professor Rosomorf!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROZ boards and takes a seat. There are the usual SUBWAY TYPES. A FAT WOMAN. A PIMPLY TEENAGER and his date, a TALL SKINNY GIRL in a PARTY DRESS. ROZ, making notations in a PAD, takes no notice of them. He sits down, closes his PAD, and taps a PENCIL against his chin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plutonium...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TAXIS go by. TWO LOVERS stroll. We hear a familiar WHINE. The "WALK" and "DON'T WALK" signs FLASH at the same time.

dialogues.speaker: BOY
dialogues.text: Make up your mind! The signs EXPLODE! The COUPLE stops in their tracks. The BOY looks at the GIRL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on? An ARC of ELECTRICITY now shoots between the LIGHT PILLAR of the SUBWAY STATION on the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPARKS fly by the window. ROZ, oblivious at first, is now stunned by the show.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ARCS of ELECTRICITY continue to rise. The STREET LIGHTS buckle and bend into weird shapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back! Get back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO TAXIS roar through the intersection and COLLIDE. The ETHNIC DRIVERS leap out and begin arguing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEOPLE SCREAM and fall back as the TRAIN seems to change angles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A building ROAR rises from the SUBWAY ENTRANCE. Then the sound of a TRAIN WHISTLE! The BOY looks down the STAIRS and has to leap out of the way as the BROADWAY EXPRESS comes highballing up the STEPS and blasts through the SUBWAY entrance. The TRAIN sails through the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TRAIN crashes into the building in a storm of cyclotron generated Dali physics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The THROB and PULSE recede. SCREAMS, HONKS, SIRENS can be heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A splendidly turned out MIDDLE-AGED WOMAN wakes from her satin sleep to see that a SUBWAY TRAIN is in the middle o her BEDROOM. The WALL through which the train has come sags and ripples like it has melted and partially resolidified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Henry!!! Several PASSENGERS climb out of the WINDOWS of the TRAIN or pry open the DOORS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here? Get out of here! Get out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CROWD has gathered to gawk and point. They look up and we see their POV. The MIDDLE CAR of the TRAIN is simply "embedded" in the HIGH-RISE, its rear sticking out of the building fifteen stories up. From its COUPLING dangles the LAST CAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car is bisected in the middle by the fused brick and glass of the WALL of the building. PASSENGERS on the outside of the WALL press their faces to the GLASS and pound for help. ROZ comes to the aid of a MOTHER with TWO CHILDREN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CROWD sees something else. Swinging high in the sky is your friendly neighborhood SPIDER-MAN. The COUPLE and TWO DRIVERS argue about what this means.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Spider-Man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get outa here, you bum!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, what are you talking about?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (back at woman)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the matter, lady don't you read the papers? This is the DRIVER of a DAILY BUGLE truck carrying the historically famous Bugle headline, "Spider-Man - Threat or Menace?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go Spidey! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nearly vertical! People are tumbled over each other. The scared TEENAGER is tearing at the door. The SKINNY GIRL screams in a mechanical way. The DOOR opens. He nearly falls! The SKINNY GIRL screams again. He manages to get back inside. She looks at him, safe now. But she screams again anyway. ROZ struggles to right himself against a pole. A BAG OF GROCERIES goes sliding past him. It continues downward and out the OPEN DOOR. INSERT: The BAG tumbles down through the air. Down, down, and down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY'S face appears in the WINDOW upside down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, everybody... He slides the WINDOW down and flips inside. He walks through the parting PASSENGERS to the BUILDING WALL. He feels it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, everyone, stand back and stay cool. He hurls himself at the fused GLASS portion and bounces back onto the floor. He rolls over, flexing his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whining)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that the real Spider-Man? SPIDEY does a TRIPLE FLIP to his feet. He reaches up for the overhead RAILING and pulls it down easily. Oohs and aahs. SPIDER-MAN points it at the GLASS and hefts it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody wanna give me a hand with this? First the WOMAN, and then all of them, take up positions on the BATTERING RAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On three. One... Two... Three! They ram the GLASS and it shatters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HENRY stands at the open DOOR of the TRAIN in his bedroom as they all come rushing through into the room.

dialogues.speaker: HENRY
dialogues.text: Come on. Come on. That's it. Step lively now.

dialogues.speaker: WIFE
dialogues.text: Henry, the rugs!

dialogues.speaker: HENRY
dialogues.text: Oh, shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have a nice evening, Ma'am... and you too, Henry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIRE TRUCKS arrive and begin assembling a LADDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY arrives at the DOOR at the top of the CAR. He sees ROZ at the bottom. THREE PEOPLE are between them. The SKINNY GIRL sees SPIDEY. She screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, folks, just hang on... He scampers down the GRAB-HANDLES to the people below. FOUR PASSENGERS cling to SEATS and BARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, one at a time. You first, Ma'am... A FAT WOMAN makes a "who me?" gesture. SPIDEY throws her over his shoulder. INSERT: THE COUPLING which holds the two CARS at right angles begins to bend open. SPIDER-MAN, the FAT WOMAN over his shoulder, goes hand over hand to the top and the WOMAN is dumped into the MIDDLE CAR. INSERT: THE COUPLING bends open a little more. SPIDEY helps the TEENAGER and the SKINNY GIRL out of the CAR. She takes the dreadful step between cars. She looks down. She screams. She steps across.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIRE LADDER is up. But it is about TEN FEET short of where it's aimed at. The end of the CAR. A FIREMAN stands at its apex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into walkie)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme more ladder! I need more ladder!

dialogues.speaker: WALKIE
dialogues.text: Negative on that, you're at full extension!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now only ROZ is left. SPIDEY approaches him. He clings to a POLE. INSERT: The COUPLING bends open! The CAR is hanging there from memory!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Doctor Otto Octavius' work. I must get back to my university. I must stop Ock... he's gone crazy. Can you help me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure thing, just don't take the train. Come on... give me your hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man! Listen to me! If he can do this with the train, if he's come this far, then I can pretty well predict his next step. He'll go to Plutonium SL 270 for the power. He must be stopped... or else he'll destroy our world. The COUPLING shrieks and the CAR lurches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get you out of here first, Professor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait Spider-Man. I don't think I can make it... You mustn't waste time saving me... you must save the world! You must go and stop Ock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where can I find him...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is looking for Plutonium SL 270 I'm sure... The CAR lurches on its side and ROZ flies out of the DOOR SPIDEY THWIPS out a WEB that girdles ROZ'S waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think Rosomorf, think where one can find Plutonium? Where could he find SL 270...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROZ is hanging in mid-air on the WEB. ROZ shouts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's only one place he can get the Plutonium SL 270...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toxic... toxic dump... any toxic dump would have SL 270. SPIDEY swings ROZ in an arc to the FIREMAN. He misses ROZ on the first pass. ROZ looks up at SPIDEY who stands in the doorway, manipulating the WEB. The FIREMAN grabs ROZ. Then, with an awful SCREECH of steel, the CAR pulls loose from the COUPLING. With SPIDER-MAN inside it, the CAR plunges ten stories to the street below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COPS, FIREMEN, PRESS, the works. The CROWD GASPS. CAMERA STROBES pop as the LAST CAR crashes to the SIDEWALK. We hold several beats on the incredible rubble. Then, a WEBBED HAND. SPIDER-MAN groggily pulls himself from the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put your hands up, Spider-Man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're making a big mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you're looking at twenty years. SPIDER-MAN shoots a WAD of WEB GOO onto the COP'S GUN and leaps up onto the LUXURY CONDO... and swings up out of th frame. The COP aims and shoots. The BULLET makes a THWUMP noise. The WEB GOO stretches out about three feet and falls limp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN swings painfully, one handed and limp, at the end of a WEB STRAND. After falling ten stories, he is groggy and weak. He can't think. He can't focus. He can barely hold onto his WRIST GIZMOS. This bug is spent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must go on... must find Ock... SL 270 Plutonium... must get that crazy old loony... before he gets to the Plutonium... toxic dump... where are the toxic dumps...? He hangs there with two hands to catch his breath and thinks. He shoots a WEB up diagonally and swings across on it. This time he catches on and holds, but barely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ is standing. AUNT MAY is seated on the COUCH, she looks weak, pale and alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're as lovely as Peter said you were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (embarrassed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. He really wanted so badly to come see you. He called me up out of the blue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (great concern)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me about Peter. What's he been up to? He seems so preoccupied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you know Peter... he's all caught up in some kind of study he's doing. Things are really crazy at the university now. Things are crazy... everywhere. I guess Peter's just... well, you know... pulled into his shell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reminiscing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Peter was little, he loved to hide. In the closets. Under the sink. He always needed a secret place. But when I'd look for him, he'd always laugh... he wanted to be found.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... well. I don't think he wants me to find him... Well, I'd better be going. My friend Flash is picking me up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This Flash... he isn't your boyfriend, is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... not really... I think you can guess why... They smile knowingly at each other. LIZ goes toward the DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elizabeth...? She turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finders keepers, losers weepers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I used to say to Peter when I found him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN swings high above it. This is not the confident swinger with LIZ in his arms. This is a guy who's making it by the narrowest of margins. There is a traffic jam below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got to find Ock... got to find the toxic dumps. (grabs his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! Oh! Oh... yeah! He looks down at the traffic. We PAN across the many CARS until we come to a non-descript GREEN CAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK is honking the HORN. Something lands on his ROOF. Then SPIDEY sticks his head, upside down, in the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's up, Ock?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You!!! A WALDO smashes through the WINDSHIELD but misses SPIDEY. OCK leaps from the CAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (on the run)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a doomed bug, Wall Crawler. I've no time to waste on you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK runs through HONKING TRAFFIC. SPIDER-MAN leaps from CAR to CAR. OCK turns to see SPIDER-MAN leap to a LIMO at the curb. OCK turns tail and runs down an alley. A FEMALE COP pops out of a DOORWAY. Her partner, a BIG, YOUNG COP, pulls his GUN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gun poised)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright! Freeze! Up against the wall and spread 'em OCK complies. He raises his hands... and spreads the WALDOS to full extension! The BIG COP screams and faints. The little FEMALE COP'S eyes POP. OCK swats the GUN from her hand. He starts to choke her. SPIDEY comes swinging to the rescue. He lands on the ROOF nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you big OCK, why don't you pick on someone your own size?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright Spider-Bug... here I've come for you... OCK leaves the COP and attacks SPIDER-MAN, shooting his iron fist at him. OCK runs to the end of the alley. SPIDEY staggers to his feet and resumes the chase. OCK breaks into a red Corvette convertible, starting it with a WALDO. SPIDER-MAN comes out in time to see the Vette drive away. A CHINESE LAUNDRY TRUCK is passing. SPIDEY THWIPS it and is whipped away. He crawls over to the WINDOW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, driver. Could you follow that red Vette for me? The surprised CHINAMAN lets loose a stream of CHINESE expletives, complete with appropriate suggestive gestures SPIDER-MAN crawls to the top of the TRUCK and surveys the situation. He sees a sea of moving traffic. He THWIPS up a WEB and swings away. SPIDEY swings along from BUILDING to BUILDING. The RED VETTE is making headway. Suddenly, SPIDER-MAN spots a blue MG with its top up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (swinging)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flash Thompson... I never thought I'd be happy to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY swoops down on the BLUE MG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY wedges down into the car, right between FLASH and LIZ. She WHOOPS. FLASH is thrilled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry about that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-man! This is unbelievable...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flash, I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You any good with this thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the best.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... catch that Vette!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger, wilco, over and out. He swerves. SPIDEY falls all over LIZ. They begin to careen through traffic, three peas in a very small pod.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: With SPIDEY jammed in between LIZ and FLASH, the MG chase the VETTE. Since neither OCK nor FLASH is any good at this, both cars quickly careen into POLES, FENCES, HOT DO CARS and begin falling apart. On RIVERSIDE DRIVE the MG begins to lurch and STEAM. The VETTE looks eaten away. The GEORGE WASHINGTON BRIDGE looms ahead. The VETTE roars through the TOLL BOOTH. They spot OCK stuck in traffic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why is he going to New Jersey, and who is it in that shitty red car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you recognize him... it's Ock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New Jersey has the largest toxic waste dump in the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does he want with toxic waste?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's looking for Plutonium, my dear... The car has to slow down... it's in a traffic jam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry... can't do anything about this traffic. SPIDER-MAN jumps out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try to stay with me. I don't want to lose him! Speeding along the BRIDGE, OCK sees no one. But high above, SPIDEY swings from TOWER to TOWER after him. At the last TOWER, SPIDEY leaps down onto a BIG TRUCK. The VETTE weaves and SPIDEY crosses to another BIG TRUCK. For a moment he is caught between the TWO TRUCKS, but he make it across. The VETTE takes an exit. SPIDEY leaps to the next SIGN. He aims his WRIST GIZMO and waits for the next car to tak the exit, but none does. Deflated, he drops to the ground. He looks up to see a sign on a CYCLONE FENCE. It says, "DUMP NUMBER 7 -- KEEP OUT -- RADIOACTIVE MATERIAL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bingo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The landscape has a nightmarish vision, weirdly lit by "safety lights." VATS and DRUMS ooze all kinds of bad stuff. A light is on in a dilapidated SHACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK is tossing away the CANISTERS until he comes to one marked, "HAZARD!! PLUTONIUM SL 270 HAZARD!!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open that now, and you'll spoil Christmas. SPIDEY'S peering in from a HOLE in the ROOF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Insect! I am going to squash you to death... Once I lay my Waldos on your skinny bones... OCK hurls a DRUM at SPIDEY. It erupts in a sizzle of LIQUID and GAS. Then the SIX-ARMED FIEND runs for the door with his SL 270.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK comes flying out and SPIDER-MAN grabs a WALDO. SPIDEY does a back flip and whips OCK so hard the WALDO snaps off! OCK recoils it and reacts in horror. With a roar, OCK attacks SPIDER-MAN. They battle as SUPER-ADVERSARIES. OCK gains the upper hand and tosses SPIDEY into a pile of RUSTING DRUMS. A GAS envelopes SPIDER-MAN and he begins coughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK'S WALDOS are coiled around SPIDER-MAN'S neck as the WEB SLINGER is dragged through the dump. His WHITE EYES narrow and blink. There is a capped WELL behind a WARNING SIGN. OCK tears off the CAP and then hurls the groggy SPIDEY down the WELL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Spider-Man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY falls. He cannot grab onto the slimy WALLS. At the bottom of the foul pit is a bubbling BLUE luminescent POOL. SPIDEY claws frantically at the WALLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooooooooooooo! He gets a hold and slides down to within a foot of the POOL. Its weird light shines up at him. He looks up at the starry sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay now, Spidey. Easy does it. He shoots a WEB about halfway up the PIT. It hits the wall, sizzles, and drops back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't give up, Spidey. Don't give up. The WEB GIZMO squirts out a pathetic patooey of WEB GOO. Then it hisses, empty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Empty... now what do I do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you've avoided the nuclear pool, have you, Spider-Man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, so far so good. But I can't hold on much longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pity...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on, Ock, be a good sport. Let's talk this over face to face... throw me a line... SPIDEY reaches out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... face to face... Catch this! OCK, way up at the opening above, raises a huge DRUM abov his head. The DRUM leaks toxic waste in ORANGE TENDRILS. He is about to drop it down on SPIDER-MAN...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do it, Professor! We now see FLASH and LIZ in the BLUE MG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (puts down the drum)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you... and you, young lady. Both of you are in my physic class, aren't you...? Come... you can help me. I need to get some of these drums to my laboratory... help me... and I'll give you special grades. What'd you say? Suddenly he catches FLASH with a WALDO and starts to chok him. LIZ screams and tries to help FLASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave him alone!!! Another WALDO grabs her. ROZ now appears on the scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave them alone Otto!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, they won't help me. Everybody is trying to destroy my experiment. And so are you, Rosomorf. Another WALDO grabs ROZ by his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Otto... I was wrong. I've gone over your research. It's brilliant, Otto. It's mad, but it's brilliant. You have much work left to do. I want to help you, Otto. For the sake of science, go and do your experiment. Leave... these kids alone and I'll help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will? You too? Both FLASH and LIZ shake their heads okey dokey. OCK gestures to FLASH and LIZ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me with these drums, I need to get them to my laboratory immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do as he says. OCK pushes FLASH and LIZ with his iron arm. Gripping LIZ be her hair, he shoves her into the CAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
