dialogues.text: Drive, Flash, before I flush your girl right down the toilet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Professor Rosomorf, it's no good, double dealing... why did you help him...? ROSOMORF finds a rope and looks into the well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't lose your energy screaming. Catch this rope and climb up, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drive along the highway. SPIDEY is recovering, working his neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been through the Octavius data. He has enough power with his Plutonium. Especially if he gets his hands on Parker's data, there he has enough power to do what he wants to do. And we are not going to stop him in time before the Planetary Conjunction occurs tonight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop the car. I have an idea. They're in the middle of RIVERSIDE DRIVE but a PHONE BOOT is coming up on the right. INSERT: ROZ'S foot stabs the BRAKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY gets out of the car. Then he pats himself where his pockets ought to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have a dime?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY is there, working on the COMPUTER, PHONE RINGS, HARRY picks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter, where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, Harry. You must get my paper before Ock uses it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Planetary Conjunction data? It's too late... Ock's got your paper, it's in his computer already. INSERT: The COMPUTER SCREEN displays a graphic of the SUN EARTH, and MOON lining up with JUPITER and SATURN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But don't worry... he can never use it without Plutonium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got the Plutonium, and he's on his way back to the lab! And he's got two prisoners with him... Liz and Flash!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry... he needs a huge amount of power... thousands of volts of electricity... to get to the Anti-Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can get to the power. Electrical power... to the max. Nuclear power... SL 270. And now, at the moment of full Planetary Conjunction. When all the planets line up with the sun... maximum gravitational power. The Conjunction is Ock's final power source.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn... the Conjunction is due at midnight! What are we going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLUE MG arrives and comes to a stop. OCK looks at his two prisoners in the back seat and smiles to himself... Picks up one DRUM on each shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey... have fun, young ones... for the last time. OCK leaves. LIZ and FLASH are tied together in the back seat of the CAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still ministering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We kiss the world goodbye. If he is right, all there is left to do is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait... I think I can release my right hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much time is left? Wait... I can find out... my God... 59 minutes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only way we can interfere with Ock's plan is to find a computer center... fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our University has the biggest center in town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but who's gonna work 'em?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Professor OCK comes for some more drums. He sees that LIZ and FLASH have disappeared. OCK picks up TWO DRUMS. HARRY seeing FLASH and LIZ come running to the school grounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I can get some help... I can teach anyone how to work a code in five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LIGHTS are off, but the COMPUTERS are on. HARRY looks over LIZ'S shoulder as she cracks through a code. Her SCREEN reads out, "CONNECTICUT. TECH. Fully Op, Line Backlog, Security Max Level." The last line is FLASHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, this is easy. They all run from COMPUTER to COMPUTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Harry I need help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming! HARRY types in KARNAKY LTD and gets the same response. He looks at his DIGITAL WRISTWATCH. "01:00:02" becomes "00:59:59" as we watch. Then a WARNING BUZZER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got one! I got one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Harry! Get over here! HARRY hurries to KIM'S side and elbows her out of the CHAIR. The SCREEN is flashing "WARNING, Security Breach!" HARRY'S hands fly over the keys. The KIDS gather around. LINE DRAWINGS of the CYCLOTRON (progressing from large to small detail) appear one after the other. Finally, a PIPE. There is a CIRCLE around a JOINT. And the legend "H20".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A goddamn water leak...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, look at this. Empire State University. This is our cyclotron, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (serious)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does it say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hits two keys)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It says "no information on net."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn... we can't do it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean... we can't stop loony Ock...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean the world is in danger...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must find Peter, he knows these computers better than all of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but where the hell is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mysteriously)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet he is with Spider-Man... Suddenly the lights dim. A heavy noise. An earth quake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EARTH is moving into line with the other PLANETS of the CONJUNCTION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HARRY and FLASH and LIZ and KIM, (the EARTH is SHAKING) come out running from the building beneath an enormous HANGING MOON. They are frightened. Suddenly it all stops. It's quiet, the kids look at the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at the moon... I have never seen it so big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must be the sun. We now see the sky. With the sun on one side, and the moon on the other. They watch it, shocked, frightened out of their wits.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: Suddenly from OCK'S basement lab a BLUE BEAM of LIGHT breaks through. A WHINE starts, it moves magically out of the WINDOW and PANS around a sleepy NEW YORK which doesn' know that the end is upon it. The dreaded WHINE builds throughout! People stop in their tracks, look up to the strange looking skyline. Camera comes down to a street where ROZ is DRIVING SPIDER-MAN fast toward the UNIVERSITY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROZ looks out over the skyline of NEW YORK. Lighted buildings FLARE UP and then GO DARK. The LIGHTED SPIRE of the Empire State Building FLARES UP and EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's started. Step on it Professor, or we'll never make it. They look across the campus and a strange LIGHT is coming out of the SCIENCE CENTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our campus... right there... see those beams from Ock's lab. We're late... it's coming... the Conjunction will happen in a few seconds. SPIDER-MAN massages his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop the car...! Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where...? What...? SPIDER-MAN SHOOTS out a WEB and flies toward the SCHOOL BUILDING taking ROZ with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a patchwork of make-shift repairs. OCK looks in through a WINDOW that's been melted out. He is lost in a mad rapture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RED POWER THROTTLE is at 95% POWER! SPIDER-MAN and ROZ enter, shielding their eyes from the GLARE. The COUNTDOWN CLOCK reads, "00:08:18".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking back, madly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aha! You never included the Conjunction in your calculations, did you?! Rosomorf!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn the calculations! My God, Otto, you have to hear me! The world we know will collapse! Everything we have devoted our lives to... all the patterns, all the harmonies... everything will be destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new world waits! Rosomorf! It is my destiny!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is cosmic suicide! You have no right! ROZ flings himself through the MELTED WINDOW into the EXPERIMENTAL CHAMBER. He grabs for the "BULLET" but the WALDOS grab him and throw him back. ROZ staggers backward... into the arms of SPIDER-MAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to stop him... Spider-Man you have to stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid we're too late. SPIDER-MAN attacks OCK, trying to push him away from the THROTTLE. OCK pushes SPIDER-MAN away from him so strongly that SPIDER-MAN is knocked down. OCK nudges the POWER THROTTLE forward and the WHINE increases to an ear shattering pitch. The COUNTDOWN CLOCK reads, "00:06:48". We are at 96% POWER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PAN down from the MOON to a STREET full of SIRENS and SHADOWY FIGURES running in the night. LIZ and KIM and HARRY come nearer. A very WEIRD light is emanating from the CENTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in there. I know Peter is in there. She breaks into a run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz, don't... Liz come back... come back! LIZ runs inside. They run after her. A BOLT OF ELECTRICITY flashes across the doorway, stopping them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PLANETS are playing on the COMPUTER SCREEN. Things in the room begin to rise, weightless. The ENERGY STORM is brewing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey, dokey!! My energy storm has started. My Anti-Force is on! History is being made... Spider-Man, Rosomorf cheer up friends... we're on our way to the unknown cosmos... we three are about to visit heaven... real Gods heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sees the sky through the window)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man! The Conjunction! It's happening!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CONJUNCTION is now happening. INSERT: Surreal DIALS spin madly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ runs into a HALLWAY gone berserk. Stuff is flying everywhere. TILES pull from the WALLS and crash to the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter! Peter, where are you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK throws the RED POWER THROTTLE to 97% POWER. Cacophony! The "BULLET" begins to PULSE and THROB! The DIALS spin! The COUNTDOWN CLOCK reads, "00:05:58".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FULL MOON hangs over the building. FLASH and HARRY and KIM stand at the entrance to the CENTER. FLASH starts to run to the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz! Liz come on out! They run forward but as they reach the FRONT STEPS the building lurches upward. The bottom step becomes a wall of STONE and DIRT, six feet high.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get back! Flash... get back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow...! Then the building lurches upward again! This time it pulls FREE from the ground. The KIDS take cover as WATER LINES BURST and ELECTRICAL WIRES SPARK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ opens a door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter! The building lurches throwing her back across the HALL where she crashes through another door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All manner of stuff is flying around. LIZ comes sliding across the floor. She crashes into a CABINET. GLASSWARE starts to fall on her, but crashes into the CEILING instead. She is dragged up the WALL. She kicks and screams against the Anti-Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASH, KIM and HARRY look on as heavy ELECTRICAL CABLES stretch upward to the rising CENTER and then snap in showers of sparks. As they fall away the CENTER becomes airborne. The CABLES wave up at it, shooting arcs of ELECTRICITY directly at the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ slides down the WALL. She grabs at the WINDOW and looks out. The rest of the university recedes beneath her, now a hundred feet below. And they're still rising! FLASH and HARRY look up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Liz is inside there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Professor Rosomorf and crazy Ock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about Peter? Is he there with them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, but I bet Spider-Man is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People look up at the SCIENCE CENTER. A CYCLIST, riding and looking, crashes into a TAXI. MAX REISS leaps out with the BEAUTIFUL STARLET from the TAXI.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's some show... if ever I saw one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's looking out his window seeing the University's Lab Building flying by. Up and up toward the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tear out the front page! Change the headline... The biggest news is happening right now... we need photos... a camera... get me a camera...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A very long shot of the SCIENCE CENTER rising into the CLOUDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls aside a CURTAIN and watches the SCIENCE CENTER rise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OCK works the COMPUTER as the CONSOLE sends up SHOWERS of SPARKS. He glances at the "BULLET" which now PULSES. The COUNTDOWN CLOCK at "00:04:18".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is it going Otto?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other worlds, Roz, other times, other dimensions, who knows? Who cares?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then... why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth, Rosomorf. Look at it! The new truth! The new way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't listen to him Professor Roz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you don't listen to that clown, he can't save you, or the world for that matter. A WALDO reaches in and rips ROZ off SPIDEY, flinging him back against a WALL. ROZ lands in a heap beneath a FIRE STATION (HOSE, EXTINGUISHER, AXE). We see the WALDO reach out for SPIDER-MAN. It wraps around his FOOT and begins to tug, slowly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once and for all, Spider-Man... once and for all we'll end the legend of your powers. OCK knocks SPIDER-MAN with a real BIG BLOW with his WALDO OCK is slowly dragging SPIDER-MAN to a HUGE HOLE that's been ripped in the floor by the BEAMS of ELECTRICITY. We see New York a half a mile down through the hole. We see SPIDEY being drawn across the HOLE. Then ROZ comes flying in with the FIRE AXE. ROZ hacks away at the WALDO and chops it off! The stump withdraws. OCK examines it in pain and fury!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (ultimate betrayal)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You!! You were my teacher!!! ROZ doesn't even look back. He and SPIDEY are at the edge of the HOLE and he's shaking SPIDEY furiously. OCK sends out his other WALDO and begins banging it on th floor in a frenzy on either side of ROZ and SPIDEY. Like a child denied, he smashes his steel fists against the floor again and again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were my teacher! And you want to destroy my experiment. You are a scientist for heaven sake... don't you want to know what's up there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, but not on account of our world. We have only one world... only one life. The floor begins to craze and then crack like ice around hole on a pond. BANG! BANG! SPIDEY comes to just as the section of floor beneath himself and ROZ gives way and falls through. SPIDEY grabs hold of the edge and dangles. He looks down and sees ROZ falling away beneath him, disappearing into the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling back from the dark skies)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man! Only you can save us now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roz!!! (turns to Ock)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Murderer!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget that old fool, insect. My Spider-Man... Come join me on my fantastic voyage to the 7th heaven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PLANETS are virtually in line!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ comes running through it. A BOLT OF ELECTRICITY shoots from the right to the left in front of her. She slams on the brakes and runs the other way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter! Peter!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COUNTDOWN CLOCK is at, "00:02:59". OCK throws the POWER THROTTLE to 98% POWER. He laughs and a WEB splats against his GLASSES. SPIDEY scrambles to his feet. OCK, still trying to get the WEB GOO off his GLASSES, is slammed into the CONSOLE by SPIDER-MAN. SPARKS fly and WALDOS flail blindly, smashing things. OCK tears off his GLASSES and squints through the FIRE and SMOKE and GLARE. SPIDER-MAN THWIPS the ceiling and swings into a drop kick OCK recovers. He grabs SPIDEY and slam dunks him through the hole in the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN falls through the air. He shoots up a WEB and THWIPS, it sticks to the ROCKY bottom of the FOUNDATION. OCK appears in the HOLE. He sees SPIDEY'S dilemma, hanging on a thread of WEB. A half-broken WALDO snakes down and CLIPS the WEB. But the WEB sticks to the WALDO! OCK shakes it, but he can't get loose. SPIDER-MAN shoots out another WEB at the ROCK BOTTOM and, with the leverage, he pulls OCK out. OCK swings down in a wide arc and his WALDOS catch on the ROCK upside down. He holds on fiercely. OCK scrambles out to the side of the CENTER and begins looking for an entry. SPIDER-MAN is right on his tail. The building pitches sideways! OCK turns to face SPIDER- MAN, his broken WALDOS out for BATTLE. SPIDEY grabs an EXPOSED PIPE and breaks it off, brandishing it like a broad sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's have it, old boy! A bizarre DUEL takes place. The CENTER pitches this way and that. SPIDEY and OCK move from foothold to foothold, from WINDOW to LEDGE to PARAPET. Now the CENTER pitches to a 45 degree angle. They DUEL upside down! A WINDOW GRATE crashes open and LIZ comes flying out, holding onto the GRATE for dear life!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz!! OCK seizes the opportunity to whack SPIDEY across the head. SPIDEY loses his footing but the building now lurches back and LIZ goes flying back inside. SPIDEY ducks inside too and pulls the GRATE. SPIDER-MAN uses his great strength to move a HUGE PIECE o SCIENTIFIC MACHINERY in front of the GRATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Peter? He must be here somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulling her ahead)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's around, don't worry... we'll find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COUNTDOWN CLOCK is at, "00:01:00" as SPIDEY comes flying in with LIZ in tow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This building is flying. I'm in a goddamn flying building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we have to pull some of these cables. Try those over there. I'll work on these. We gotta slow this thing down somehow. We got helicopters coming. LIZ looks at some WIRING, apprehensive about even touchin it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull! She yanks out a CABLE. The building pitches. But when SPIDEY pulls one out, it rights itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BIG BEAMS start cutting out one by one. The CENTER begins to PITCH and YAW. The CHOPPERS are getting closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COUNTDOWN CLOCK reads, "00:00:15" as SPIDEY and LIZ continue to pull WIRES and CABLES. TWO WALDOS erupt through the floor and grab SPIDEY. They pull SPIDEY to the floor. Entangled in these molybdimum pythons, SPIDEY struggles valiantly. LIZ leaps to his aid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... A third WALDO, a broken one, snakes up from the HOLE and begins feeling blindly around on the CONSOLE for the POWE THROTTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The power! LIZ sees the damaged WALDOS heading for the RED THROTTLE. The COUNTDOWN CLOCK is at "00:00:10". LIZ leaps and tries to wrestle it away. It whips in her arms and she holds on tight. It bangs her against the wall and then the CONSOLE. She holds on. "00:00:03". The WALDO crashes LIZ against the wall which erupts in SPARKS. She lets go of it. It heads for the POWER THROTTLE! "00:00:01!" SPIDER-MAN can't break the grip of the WALDOS, but he can pull with super-human strength. He yanks OCK up through the STONE floor. OCK hits the ceiling of the CONTROL ROOM. ONE WALDO grabs on. The other one throws the RED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man. You're end is coming. Life in its present form is ending... new dimensions, new horizons... The UNIVERSAL BULLET begins to GLOW. The GLOW sharpens to a POINT of LIGHT. SPIDER-MAN holds on tight against a rushing ENERGY FLOW that's pulling everything in the room towards the POINT of LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bracing against the storm)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (similarly braced)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know!!! LIZ starts to slip away into the flow. She struggles against it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't... hold on! SPIDEY THWIPS her and she grabs onto the WEB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold tight, Liz, hold tight! OCK drops calmly, beatifically, to the floor of the room. He moves slowly, under his own power, into the LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (spaced out)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cut my power... there's too little power... It's so tiny... so tiny... there's only space... for me. But I've done it, Spider-Man. I have broken through... I've broken through!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do it, Dr. Octavius!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okey... dokey... Now that's what I call an experiment!!! As he nears the LIGHT he actually becomes a part of it. He radiates LIGHT. He shimmers and shines. He fills the room with BLINDING LIGHT. SPIDEY and LIZ shield their eyes, and as the light diminishes, the storm subsides. They're safe. Except for the fact that they're in a floating building, 10,000 feet above the city!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against the backdrop of the MOON, a SQUADRON of HELICOPTERS approaches the CENTER. From their POV, a HUGE CRACK opens across the face of the building. The CENTER begins to drop in PULSING SURGES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDER-MAN is at the CONSOLE pulling and putting back WIRES. LIZ, fascinated, looks in at the WINDOW where OCK disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't control her. She's dropping too fast! Alright... let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about Peter? We've got to find Peter!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter will be okay, I promise you... Let's go before it's too late. (he grabs her)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It rotates and drops. The HELICOPTERS come in like the cavalry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trying to leave it, LIZ and SPIDEY are confronted with a nightmare. The room is tilted at a 45% angle. PIPES are bursting. SPIDEY helps LIZ through the obstacles. Debris rains down. They come face to face with a diagonal maze of PIPES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe there's another way... A HUGE CRACK opens above them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's breaking apart!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, keep moving, a step at a time! They scale the maze, but as they emerge on the other side half the floor falls away! Central Park awaits, 8,000 feet below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't go back. He looks across at the door. It is midway up a diagonal wall. He shoots a WEB up at the ceiling between themselves and the door. Then he extends a hand to LIZ.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, have it your way. He swings across and lands on the LEDGE of the DOOR. Then he swings the WEB back to her like a trapeze. LIZ catches the WEB and looks across at SPIDER-MAN, furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting across)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I supposed to do with this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting back)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. It's easier than it looks! We've got to try the fire escape. LIZ swings across like TARZAN and SPIDEY gathers her in o the LEDGE. She does a comic "phew" and the LEDGE buckles beneath them but holds. SPIDER-MAN tries to open the door, but it's stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door is stuck. SPIDER-MAN bends his back to the task. It take all his strength, but with a comic AAAAARGGHH! He bends the DOOR open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They burst out onto the ROCK FOUNDATION of the building. New York is rushing up to meet them. The WIND created by their fall buffets them. The HELICOPTERS arrive, and the falling building plunges right past them. The HELICOPTERS look across at each other, helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It drops like a stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SPIDEY and LIZ are falling away from the DOOR, sliding along the ROCK. LIZ is stopped by a RETAINING WALL. SPIDEY keeps sliding. He THWIPS the wall and then disappears over the edge. LIZ screams! LIZ fights to her feet and grabs onto the WEB STAND. She pulls on it with all her strength. She pulls and pulls and pulls. We see the WEB running up between the ROCKS. She gives one last pull and comes up with an EMPTY WEB END. A long, long beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Liz, Up here! LIZ looks up and sees PETER hanging out the WINDOW two stories above her. He throws out a ROPE LADDER. LIZ grabs it. She begins to climb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PETER pulls LIZ through the WINDOW. There is no time for an embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. I've found a way down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (at long last, love)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew you were going to say that. They run out of the ROOM. We PAN down and see, crumpled beneath the WINDOW, the SPIDER-MAN suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the LAB we saw in the opening sequence. PETER has turned on the lights. He's got a handful of ROPE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the way out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right there! We are looking at the HUGE AMERICAN FLAG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, help me with this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIZ is already down the ROPE LADDER and is holding it for PETER. He comes down with a HUGE bundle of RED, WHITE &am BLUE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, stand still. He ties some ROPE around her waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this going to work?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just adore confidence in a man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... They move to the edge of the ROCK and look down. CENTRAL PARK is still a couple thousand feet down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it you say when you jump?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your prayers. They SCREAM as the building lurches again, knocking them to the ground. They start to slide across the ROCK. They reach out for each other but their hands don't quite reach. Slowly, they inch back together, but the FOUNDATION crack between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It spins and falls beneath us. Down, down it goes. And then it crashes into the GREAT LAWN. A huge cloud of debris shoots upward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a beautiful FULL MOON. PETER and LIZ float down into the frame lit by its wonderful light. The AMERICAN FLAG which has turned into a huge parachute. They hold each other tight. They can hear SIRENS below. They begin to laugh with relief. Then they stop. The wind billows LIZ'S skirt and plays with PETER'S hair, and snaps in the AMERICAN FLAG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a lot to thank your friend Spider-Man for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somehow, I don't think we've seen the last of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter...! Finders, keepers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What...? What is it? Why do you look like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I'm in love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (even his eyes blush)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With your friend...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spider-Man? You're in love with Spider-Man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am... you think we'll see him again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might... you never know. He kisses her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. (bittersweet)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This may be the end of a beautiful friendship you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah. They land in the center of the park under the parachute. They stay there and kiss... completely covered by the flag. Camera pulls up to show the building floating away.
